SELECT COUNT(*) AS allBoardCount
FROM FOLLOW F
INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON F.FOLLOW_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
INNER JOIN BOARD B ON F.FOLLOW_NO = B.BOARD_NO
AND F.FOLLOWING_MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOW_NO = #{follow_no} AND FOLLOWING_MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, F.FOLLOW_DATE, M.MEMBER_NICK, M.MEMBER_POINT, M.MEMBER_PROFILE
FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN FOLLOW F ON M.MEMBER_NICK = F.MEMBER_NICK
WHERE M.MEMBER_NO IN (SELECT FOLLOWING_MEMBER_NO FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOW_NO = #{member_no}) ORDER BY F.FOLLOW_DATE DESC
